definition: erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2 xi2 fu5]

sentences.english: Mrs…has never really got on with her daughter-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 老太太從未與兒媳婦兒真正和睦相處過。

sentences.english: Mrs…and her daughter-in-law have never really got on.
sentences.chinese: 老太太從未與兒媳婦兒真正和睦相處過。

sentences.english: The rapport between the old lady and her daughter-in-law is good, and made them buy and sell stocks together.
sentences.chinese: 老太太和兒媳婦兒的關係很好，她們一起買賣股票。
